trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripRenderer1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow>事件。

trans-unit.source: The graphics used to paint the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> arrow.
trans-unit.target: 繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 箭號所用的圖形。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> on which to paint the arrow.
trans-unit.target: 要在其上繪製箭號的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The bounding area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> arrow.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 箭號的周圍區域。

trans-unit.source: The color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> arrow.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 箭號的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The direction in which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> arrow points.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 箭號所指的方向。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripArrowRenderEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripArrowRenderEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> arrow.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 箭號的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color of the arrow.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示箭號的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripRenderer1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bounding area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> arrow.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 箭號的周圍區域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounding area.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示周圍區域。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction in which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> arrow points.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 箭號所指的方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection" /> 值。
